column4: on my machine, giving xp 512, it's fast enough to allow me to use Office 2007 for supporting my clients, which is all I need it for. virtualbox was the last piece of the puzzle that got me out of windows forever  :D
btw....Misrosoft gave me Office 2007 Enterprises for going to their launch event :D Wasn't that nice of them?
only if you can return it for money :)
nah..I'll kep it. It'll be nice to show the bloat comparet to OO..   :)
